name: Undertale Green: The Pre-Show
storyline: Olive and their sister Chai go through the motions after school, however things take a turn for the strange as a rainy day turns to pouring night...
summary: Experience a one-shot adventure setting up the vibrant characters of Undertale Green through a drab snippet of the surface! Interact with an unorthodox battle system, make new friends, and prepare for the long road ahead.

videos.name: Trailer
videos.title: Undertale Green: The Pre-Show | UNDEREVENT 2024 Trailer
